name: DRIFTING Through Time
description:
Turning your car sideways is SO COOL it FREEZES TIME! Drift to stop time, get as many laps as you can before time runs out!

Controllers RECOMMENDED, though WASD/ARROW KEYS works too!

(If you can get more than 3 laps you're officially the best in the WORLD at this game, true facts.)

This is my first game-a-week game of 2019! More small games coming soon :)
